Name: Limiting the issuance of notices of violations to food service establishments during certain times.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the issuance of notices of violations to food service establishments during certain times

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Health

Summary: The proposed legislation would limit Department of Health and Mental Hygiene inspections of food service establishments to certain times. This would help limit disruptions of restaurant operations during particularly busy times of the day.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


	Section 1. Chapter 15 of title 17 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding new section 17-1506 to read as follows:
	� 17-1506 Food service establishment inspections. The department shall be prohibited from conducting inspections and issuing notices of violations to food service establishments during the hours of 12:00 p.m. to 2:00 p.m., and 6:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m.	 
	�2.	This local law takes effect 90 days after it becomes law.
